00040 SimulationManager::SimulationManager() : currentEnvironment(NULL), paused(false), active(false), timeFactor(1.0), remainingTime(0)
00041 {
00042     preyManager = new PreyManager();
00043     predatorManager = new PredatorManager();
00044 
00045     //Environment creation code goes here.
00046     environments["Test"] = new TestEnvironment();
00047     environments["Swamp"] = new SwampEnvironment();
00048 
00049     //Predator BehaviorFamily creation goes here.
00050     predatorFamilies["Generic"] = new GenericPredatorBehaviorFamily();
00051     predatorFamilies["Aggressive"] = new AggressivePredatorFamily();
00052     predatorFamilies["Ambush"] = new AmbushPredatorFamily();
00053     predatorFamilies["Feline"] = new FelinePredatorFamily();
00054 
00055     //Prey BehaviorFamily creation goes here.
00056     preyFamilies["Generic"] = new GenericPreyBehaviorFamily();
00057     preyFamilies["Alert"] = new AlertPreyFamily();
00058     preyFamilies["Careful"] = new CarefulPreyFamily();
00059     preyFamilies["Defensive"] = new DefensivePreyFamily();
00060 
00061     currentEnvironment = environments.begin()->second;
00062 }

00064 SimulationManager::~SimulationManager()
00065 {
00066     delete preyManager;
00067     delete predatorManager;
00068 
00069     currentEnvironment = NULL;
00070 
00071     map<string, Environment*>::const_iterator iter;
00072     for (iter = environments.begin(); iter != environments.end(); ++iter)
00073         delete iter->second;
00074 
00075     map<string, PredatorBehaviorFamily*>::const_iterator iter2;
00076     for (iter2 = predatorFamilies.begin(); iter2 != predatorFamilies.end(); ++iter2)
00077         delete iter2->second;
00078 
00079     map<string, PreyBehaviorFamily*>::const_iterator iter3;
00080     for (iter3 = preyFamilies.begin(); iter3 != preyFamilies.end(); ++iter3)
00081         delete iter3->second;
00082 
00083     manager = NULL;
00084 }

00086 void SimulationManager::start()
00087 {
00088     TimerManager::get()->createTimer("simulation", true);
00089 
00090     ScriptManager::get()->addBindings(new SimulationBinder());
00091 
00092     SceneManager* scene = SceneManager::get();
00093 
00094     cam = scene->getCamera();
00095 
00096     scene->createSceneNode("cam_node", hgeVector(0, 0))->attachComponent(cam);
00097     oldCameraPosition = cam->getCenter();
00098 
00099     scene->getSceneNode("cam_node")->createChildSceneNode("background_node");
00100 
00101     background = static_cast<SimpleRenderable*>(scene->createComponent("SimpleRenderable", "background"));
00102     background->setSprite(currentEnvironment->getBackgroundSpriteName());
00103 
00104     scene->getSceneNode("background_node")->attachComponent(background);
00105     scene->getSceneNode("background_node")->setZ(1.0);
00106 
00107     uvCoords.x = 0;
00108     uvCoords.y = 0;
00109 
00110     oldMousePosition = InputManager::get()->getMousePosition();
00111 
00112     ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->LoadScript("../resources/data/Pointers.res");
00113 }
00114 
00115 void SimulationManager::stop()
00116 {
00117     TimerManager::get()->destroyTimer("simulation");
00118     ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->Purge(1);
00119 }

00126 void SimulationManager::setActiveEnvironment(const string& environment)
00127 {
00128     if (environments.find(environment) != environments.end())
00129     {
00130         currentEnvironment->clearEnvironment();
00131         currentEnvironment = environments[environment];
00132     }
00133     else
00134         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Unknown Environment name passed [" + environment + "].");
00135 }
00136 
00137 Environment* SimulationManager::getEnvironment(const string& type)
00138 {
00139     if (environments.find(type) != environments.end())
00140         return environments[type];
00141     else
00142         Utils::get()->writeToLog("No Environment named [" + type + "] exists, returning NULL.");
00143     return NULL;
00144 }

00149         return predatorFamilies[name];

00152     return NULL;

00164 void SimulationManager::pause()
00165 {
00166     if (active && !paused)
00167         paused = true;
00168 }
00169 
00170 void SimulationManager::unpause()
00171 {
00172     if (active && paused)
00173         paused = false;
00174 }

00176 const bool& SimulationManager::isPaused()
00177 {
00178     return paused;
00179 }
00180 
00181 void SimulationManager::activate()
00182 {
00183     if (!active)
00184     {
00185         active = true;
00186         paused = false;
00187     }
00188 }
00189 
00190 void SimulationManager::deactivate()
00191 {
00192     if (active)
00193     {
00194         TimerManager::get()->stopTimer("simulation");
00195         currentEnvironment->clearEnvironment();
00196         active = false;
00197     }
00198 }

00201 {
00202     return active;

00205 void SimulationManager::setTimeFactor(const double& factor)
00206 {
00207     if (factor > 0)
00208            timeFactor = factor;
00209     else
00210         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Invalid time factor passed, time factor values must be greater than 0.");
00211 }

00213 const double SimulationManager::getTimeFactor()
00214 {
00215     return timeFactor;

00218 const double SimulationManager::getUpdateInterval()
00219 {
00220     return 1.0 / MAX_FPS;
00221 }
00222 
00223 void SimulationManager::update()
00224 {
00225     if (InputManager::get()->getKeyState(HGEK_RBUTTON) )
00226     {
00227         hgeVector mousePosition = InputManager::get()->getMousePosition();
00228         hgeVector mouseMoved = mousePosition - oldMousePosition;
00229         uvCoords += mouseMoved;
00230         background->setTextureCoords(uvCoords.x, uvCoords.y, 800, 600);
00231         cam->getParent()->translate(hgeVector(mouseMoved.y, mouseMoved.x));
00232         InputManager::get()->setMousePosition(oldMousePosition);
00233     }
00234     else
00235         oldMousePosition = InputManager::get()->getMousePosition();
00236 
00237 
00238     if (active)
00239     {
00240         double updateInterval = 1.0 / MAX_FPS;
00241         double maxCyclesPerFrame = MAX_FPS / MIN_FPS + 20;
00242         double updateIterations = Utils::get()->getDTime() * timeFactor + remainingTime;
00243 
00244         if (updateIterations > (maxCyclesPerFrame * updateInterval))
00245             updateIterations = (maxCyclesPerFrame * updateInterval);
00246 
00247         while (updateIterations > updateInterval)
00248         {
00249             updateIterations -= updateInterval;
00250             TimerManager::get()->addTimerTime("simulation", updateInterval);
00251             predatorManager->update();
00252             preyManager->update();
00253             currentEnvironment->update();
00254         }
00255 
00256         remainingTime = updateIterations;
00257     }
00258 }
00259 
00260 const double SimulationManager::getSimulationElapsedTime()
00261 {
00262     return TimerManager::get()->getTimerTime("simulation");
00263 }
00264 
00265 const string SimulationManager::getSimulationTime()
00266 {
00267     double time = getSimulationElapsedTime();
00268 
00269     unsigned int day = time / 86400;
00270     unsigned int dayTime = time - day * 86400 ;
00271     unsigned int hour = dayTime / 3600;
00272     unsigned int minute = dayTime / 60;
00273     unsigned int second = dayTime % 60;
00274 
00275     return Utils::get()->formatString("%i:%i:%i Day: %i", hour, minute, second, day);
00276 }
00277 
00278 SimulationManager* SimulationManager::get()
00279 {
00280     if (manager == NULL)
00281         manager = new SimulationManager();
00282 
00283     return manager;
00284 }
